name: Mindsweeper: Puzzle Adventure
description:
CAN YOU RECOVER THE MISSING MEMORIES?

When you wander into someone's mind it is hard to distinguish memory from imagination...

Soon after the Genetic Plague was released, Dr. Amy Harris successfully found a cure. Unfortunately, someone broke into the government lab, stole the formula, and infected Dr. Harris. As a mind sweeper, my job is to dive into Amy's disappearing mind in hope of finding the formula before it is too late…

UNIQUE STORY
A unique adventure escape game that you are bound to remember! Untangle a lifetime of memories to find a hidden scientific discovery that will save humanity!

BEAUTIFUL 3D GRAPHICS
Explore beautiful hand-made 3D levels with mesmerizing visual effects, immersive atmosphere, and natural camera control.

THRILLING GAMEPLAY
Combine objects, interact with characters, solve increasingly challenging puzzles and locate hidden memory glimpses to escape each memory block, and proceed to the next one.

ATMOSPHERIC AUDIO
Best enjoyed with sound! Custom soundtrack themes for each chapter and specially selected ambient sounds will complement each other for an immersive experience.

TRY FOR FREE
Play for free with the option to purchase additional levels and experience the whole story that will leave you impressed.

SUPER WIDESCREEN SUPPORT
The puzzle game looks beautiful on new 18:9 phones and also shines on tablet devices. Enjoy stunning and astoundingly detailed 3D graphics that look exquisite.

If you love puzzle games, you will not miss such a wonderful challenge!
Unforgettable and fascinating room escape levels, for all of the adventure fans out there.
